{"id":633212963,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1643835821,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"10 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/633212963/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) \n    {\n        int start = 0, end = s.length()-1;\n        \n        while(start<=end)\n        {\n\n            if(!iswalnum(s[start]))\n                    {\n                        start++;\n                    }\n            \n            else if(!iswalnum(s[end]))\n                    {\n                        end--;\n                    }\n            else if(tolower(s[start]) != tolower(s[end]))\n                    {\n                        return false;\n                    }\n            else\n                    {\n                        start++;\n                        end--;\n                    }\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome"}
